name: Solo Box HopperPlot
description:
In this puzzle game, you must use a single box to hold down several buttons and progress.

In order to achieve this, make use of the holopads which record your every move once activated, then replay them using a hard-light construct once you return to the pad.

It's a simple game, but as long as you don't expect too much, I think you'll enjoy it.

Controls: arrow keys to move, space button to wait one action, "R" to reset the current level.

TIP: Holograms can get pushed around the same way as boxes, so you can push them, or cut them off, to desynchronize their movement from the actions you originally performed.
